page.head: Cleaning Teeth
page.body:
It's easy to brush and floss your teeth.
While brushing your teeth, listen to a song. When the song is over, you should have brushed all of your teeth well.
Listen to another song, and by the time that one is finished, you should be done flossing!

page.head: How To Brush
page.body: Put a pea sized drop of toothpaste on your toothbrush. Brush each tooth from the gums towards the edge of the tooth where you bite. Brush the tops of your mollars. Brush the back side of each tooth from the gums to the edge. Spit out the toothpaste and rinse your mouth.

page.head: How To Floss
page.body: Measure dental floss to be about as long as your forearm. Wind the floss around your middle fingers. Gently rock the floss between your teeth. Run the floss up and down both teeth in the gap. Gently rock the floss out. Repeat the rocking with a clean part of your floss for every gap between your teeth.
